pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for the 'Notion API' // Enable programmatic interaction with 'Notion' pages, databases, blocks, comments, and users through the 'Notion API' https://developers.notion.com/. Provides both synchronous and asynchronous client interfaces for building workflows and automations that integrate with 'Notion' workspaces. Supports all 'Notion API' endpoints including content creation, data retrieval, and workspace management.
